description: Finds values in a list that match a pattern.

input.name: pattern
input.description: A text or a regular expression to be searched for within the list. Regular expressions must be wrapped with / character (e.g. /.*/).

output.name: values
output.description: A list with the elements that match the testing pattern

output.name: complementary
output.description: A list with the elements that do not match the testing pattern.
